description: "Regional borders are colour-coded on this mid-19th century map of mainland Southeast Asia, with British colonial territory in red (including part of the Burman Empire, the Straits Settlements, and Sarawak on Borneo)."
title: "Map   of   the   Burman   Empire   including   also   Siam,   Cochin-China,   Ton-King   and   Malaya"
